Hey Brian,

Could you please point Michael to the extra steps required to get the dbunit jars setup?

Thanks in advance,
Rob

Hey Michael... Because of the way Eclipse is with distributing 3rd party libs, we can't ship the DbUnit libs directly in the DbUnit wrapper plug-in we have built for Eclipse DTP (kind of silly, but copyright/intellectual property/etc have made for an interesting environment for this kind of stuff). 

If you:

1) Go to the DbUnit download site (http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=47439&release_id=211888)

2) Download the DbUnit 2.2 zip (or tar, whichever archive you need for your OS) 

3) Unzip the three jars in there into the org.dbunit plug-in's lib directory

4) Then restart your workbench, you'll probably have much better luck.

There's a BZ entry out there currently that we are looking at adding an ANT script to grab the jars more easily. But that hasn't been added yet (should for next week's builds of DTP).

Hope that helps.
--Brian Fitzpatrick
